title.value: Влияние последействия органических удобрений на урожайность ярового рапса на дерново-подзолистой супесчаной почве
The influence of organic fertilizers aftereffect on the spring rape yield on sod-podzolic loamy sand soil

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Biryukova, O.M., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the influence of organic fertilizers different types and doses aftereffect (1 year) on the spring rape (Brassica napus) seeds productivity on sod-podzolic sandy loam soil. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2010-2012. As a result of realized research it was revealed that the best rape seeds yield obtained in variants with organic-mineral fertilizer – 22.5- 23.7 centner /ha. Organic fertilizers application under rapeseed produced at the output of biogas installation, at a dose of 40 t/ha, provided a similar yield (22.2 centner/ha). Due to the aftereffect of bedding manure and compost obtained 4.3-5.6 kg/ha of rapeseed. Net income from th6 fertilizers use was 1371.8-2113/0 Belarusian rubles/ha with 73-105% return. The use of organic fertilizers produced at the output of the biogas plant was highly profitable (119-189%).
